title: WATCH: Baby Cele and Thabo Maloka's traditional wedding
text:
WATCH: Baby Cele and Thabo Maloka's traditional wedding share this

Cape Town - Baby Cele and Thabo Maloka have celebrated their union with a traditional wedding ceremony in Umlazi, Durban.

The couple, who have been together for five years, tied the knot during a white wedding ceremony two years ago.

The extravagant affair was planned and executed by celebrity wedding planner Nono Skosana.

Nono also planned Somizi Mhlongo and Mohale Motaung lavish wedding last week

ALSO READ: PICS: Somizi and Mohale's lavish traditional wedding

ALSO READ: Somizi and Mohale's wedding planner reveals all the big-day secrets
description: Baby Cele and Thabo Maloka have celebrated their union with a traditional wedding ceremony in Umlazi, Durban.
